name: fischer plug finder
description: Which plug is the right (one) for my application? How can I safely fasten my new kitchen shelf or cabinet or the mirror in the bathroom?  The fischer plug-finder app helps the do-it-yourselfer to choose the right plug and gives important fastening tips. Our videos show you how to install the plug and demonstrates its functions clearly and precisely.  The integrated dealer-search-function gives you the nearest supplier for your desired fischer product. The built-in scanning function provides detailed product information.
